website_summaries.verdict: Built tough to protect your wine and attractive to carry.
pros: We love the extra insulation and padding
Versatile flap allows for the ideal fit
There's extra storage and eight color options too
cons: Wine will stay colder longer if you refrigerate this tote first

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for carrying wine. It is so convenient. We purchased the three bottle carrier which is perfect for two people and it even includes a wine opener. We carry two bottles of wine in it and put two glasses in the center which is ideal. We would recommend it to everyone who enjoys wine. L. Roll
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling or taking wine to friends
customer_reviews.text: We can carry 2 bottles of wine with wine glasses (collapsible plastic) in the middle section. Or I can put a bottle of red in then a blue ice in the middle to keep the bottle white chilled. It doesn't have the heavier construction that my other wine carrier has but its serving its purpose. The lighter weight does make it easier to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect addition to our silent art auction wine auction packages. They looked much more expensive than they are! We bought two, the red and black one and the taupe and black one. Both were high quality, and felt durable. The bottles fit easily, and the zippers gave me no trouble at all!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Barry

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful bag but buyer should be warned it only holds ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful bag but buyer should be warned it only holds 2 small bottles of wine. Only one large bottle can fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Good

customer_reviews.title: These bags were a big hit and I loved not having to wrap presents
customer_reviews.text: I bought 24 of these to give to my clients as a Christmas gift. I gave each a bottle of Red and White. These bags were a big hit and I loved not having to wrap presents. I just handed them the bags and they were all excited - will be doing the same next year.
customer_reviews.author: Thailand Soul

customer_reviews.title: It carries two bottles of wine with ease.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I was looking for. Perfect size for BYO parties. Carries two bottles of wine with cork remover attached so I never have to remember to tuck it in. It also fits a wide bottle of the pre-mixed cocktails that are becoming so popular now. I am able to place a portable ice pack in the front pocket. I love the strong canvas material that makes for easy carrying. Adjustable strap or handle use is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Celley

customer_reviews.title: carry a 16 oz. Cauldryn coffee tumbler and a 24 oz water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with the purpose of using my coffee mug and water bottle. I must say, I'm glad I ignored the reviews. I am able to carry a 16 oz. Cauldryn metal coffee travel tumbler and a 24 oz metal water bottle. Both fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: OneSourOne

customer_reviews.title: overall good use
customer_reviews.text: just a great product when you have to bring a few bottles of wine. so much better than the "kroger 6 bottle tote".
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Yahn

customer_reviews.title: Step up from that paper bag
customer_reviews.text: If your wife does not like carrying a nice wine or 3 to the dinner party in an ordinary bag or whatever, get her one of these. She will even carry it.
customer_reviews.author: H Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for two thin wine bottles, but I use it for a lunch bag--nicely holds tall water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa319

customer_reviews.title: Great wine lover gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cooler for carrying wine. The checker style looks even better in person. Love the carrying strap so your hands are free only issue the middle divider too flimsy but I just slide a ice pack in between the bottles and no problems plus wine is extra cold.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica T.

customer_reviews.title: Fashionably discreet
customer_reviews.text: My parents live in a close knit, private, mostly retired community where they each take turns hosting dinners and entertaining each other more nights of the week than not. This was the perfect gift for them to easily and carefully transport their wine or other spirits when walking to their neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very decent wine tote for the price. Of course, I got right before we were ordered to Shelter in Place because of COVID so have had no chance to use it. Maybe someday, if there are any restaurants left and we are able to gather with friends for dinner, I may get a chance to actually use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Brother-in-law loved this
customer_reviews.text: This is a very functional case. And as my brother-in-law loves wine AND travels a lot, it was the perfect gift for him since he's been traveling with a bottle of wine in his suitcase and had feared it would break and ruin his and his wife's clothes. So he was ecstatic that it could be packed inside his checked luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the quality of this product. I bought this for my mom and stepfather to pack their when when they go to their favorite BYOB restaurant. I added a cute vinyl decal to the front...but be careful with heat!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised, I wanted something to carry 2 bottles of wine or 1 bottle and 2 sodas that would stay cold in transport. The color is true to online. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Diana Keepers

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional for the wino in your life
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to an avid wine drinker, and she loves it! She travels frequently and always brings wine with her. There is a little elastic under the lid to hold a bottle opener, and it's fully insulated. It's stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this wine holder. It really does keep my bottles nice n chilled. I appreciate the spaces which can accommodate wine bottles or various liquor bottles.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift bag that’s functional too
customer_reviews.text: This was as good as it looked and was described. Used as a gift bag for friends and they thought it was great and will use to take wines to their next party
customer_reviews.author: Nicole-KC

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive and functional
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what is needed to take wine, opener, house/car keys to a get together. It is roomy but compact and easy to carry. I love it! It may become a gift for birthdays and Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: LilyMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a BYOB restaurant
customer_reviews.text: Holds 3 small bottles or 2 large bottles of wine which is perfect for traveling. I also purchased the two bottle wine carrier from the same vendor and LOVE that one too. Love the color, style and high quality of this product. Recommend to my fellow BYOB restaurant enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mantel

customer_reviews.title: Good for travelling
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this as gift. They like it. This product is good for normal wine bottle size. But it does not hold two champagne Bottle. if you want to put in champagnes then only one can be put in.
customer_reviews.author: Wunvjin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wine carrier
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for evening cocktails with friends at a social distanced gathering somewhere. It's good for two bottles plus two plastic glasses in the middle. Or one bottle, glasses, and snacks in the third compartment.
customer_reviews.author: southern lady

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift. It's a good idea for the wine drinker in your group. It holds two bottles of wine or you can stack up beer and ice on one side and wine with on the other side. It keeps the cold in for a hot day
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: This bag is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it. The first time using it the zipper broke. The quality of the whole bag is sub par. The hardware used for the straps is crap. The corkscrew included also broke. We returned without issue and are still looking
customer_reviews.author: caplibis

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Cool
customer_reviews.text: Besides fitting two wine bottles perfectly, these are a perfect size to fit four cans or water bottles on non wine days. I gave them as gifts and my girls use them on the golf course. Plenty of room to include an ice pack too!
customer_reviews.author: LV4EWA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for a friend and she loves it! Uses it for taking out on her boat, will purchase more for gifts. Good quality made and the wine opener included was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Purchased As A Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a "wine themed" gift basket! The recipient LOVED it and said it was well made and "perfect"!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine cooler! Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag! It holds 2 champagne bottles, or a 1.5 liter wine bottle, or even 1 1.5 liter bottle AND a 750 ml bottle, though the neck on the larger bottle is a little tall. I was still able to zipper it shut. It comes with a good double-jointed corkscrew (ie it has 2 lever points, if you are a corkscrew aficionado). Good value on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but don't put Ice in it to keep your wine cool it leaks - use a plastic cool holder so that it doesn't leak
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wine carrier
customer_reviews.text: We love this carrier! It has traveled to many picnics, outdoor concerts, and other gatherings. It is sturdy and keeps the bottles chilled!
customer_reviews.author: Abby H.

customer_reviews.title: Great wine case at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: Fits two bottles of wine and a corkscrew. This case is insulated, so the white wines stay cool until we get to our destination. There's a movable divider attached to one side of the case to keep the bottles from hitting each other.
customer_reviews.author: GavinK42

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality, especially for wine tasting or a picnic and you like to keep your hands free. When we aren't carrying three bottles, we usually have one with ice packs and stackable plastic stemless glasses. This one 3qs a gift and they love it as well. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish wine carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute wine carrier bag. I brought the black checkered one and it looks exactly like the photo. The hinges that hold the shoulder straps looks flimsy. However, I used it twice to carry my wine with no issues. I would definitely recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined, great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wine club, it easily handles two bottles or one plus two glasses and includes a corkscrew. It’s streamlined with a solid shoulder strap. Seems decent quality for the $20 price
customer_reviews.author: pfishh

customer_reviews.title: Love this wine carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and would make a wonderful gift. I plan on purchasing several more and would highly recommend. Although, I do wish the insert could be removed to store in the freezer it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift... now I want one
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a family member and almost gave them something different because I wanted it. It appeared to be durable. The color was perfect and classy. I love that the strap is removable.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: I loved the blue color as well as the quality of construction. It was a welcomed gift by the people who received it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 2 bottles
customer_reviews.text: This barely fits two bottles of wine. I’m leaving two bottles in it to try and stretch it out, but it’s a super tight fit. I wouldn’t buy this again
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Two Bottle Insulated Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great two bottle insulated carrier. It looks kind of like it’s Louis Vuitton. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a lunch box, purse, Cooler. It cute stylish and looks like a nice cross over bag. I pack snacks for my kids for ball games etc. I also carry my way wallet and bottles of water to sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good product; well made, it was gifted as a secret Santa gift. Receiver was happy
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Save and sound
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. It keeps the bottles safe and cool. It's great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and functional wine carrier. My wife and I frequently attend cooking classes and this is an ideal carrier. Like the fact that it's insulated and comes with cork opener.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Korinchock

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PICNICS AND CONCERTS
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine carrier. So happy with the durability. Has a padded divider inside so bottles don’t clink. Love the red color. Can’t wait to use it for future concerts. Insulated and keeps wine cold. You even have space to add a cold pack. Satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, sturdy, with bottle opener, divider, carry strap. Well insulated
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice, and seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gif. Two regular size bottles fit well in it and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it. Great for picnics, camping, beach days and so on ..
customer_reviews.author: roxanne merriett

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I have been looking for for the longest. I've never been happy with the awkward boxy vinyl lunch totes. This is elegant, has nice room inside, is well padded and carries easily close to the body.
customer_reviews.author: djaybx

customer_reviews.title: Good insulation
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, but seems to be insulated very well
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead.  Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used this multiple times over the holidays and it works perfectly. 2 bottles of wine are easily and safely transported
customer_reviews.author: Martha Degrandchamp

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a two wine bottles
customer_reviews.text: I tried a number of wine and champaign bottles and they simply do NOT fit. Its a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Ralt584489

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. It holds two bottles and you can pack two to-go cups over the tops of the bottles. Come with a bottle opener which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but small
customer_reviews.text: Won't even hold (2) bottles is they are not the narrow type. Too small
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Keeps Wine Cold
customer_reviews.text: Well made, stylish, and fits two bottles of wine perfectly. Insulation keeps them cold & protected.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation piece in the park!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my spring and summer outdoor events. I enjoy jazz concerts and trips over to the beach. I ordered the bag that holds 3 bottles so I can put a bottle on each outer pockets and my wine glasses in the middle pocket. I'm all set for a wonderful compact carrier. Love owning such a eye catcher!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this bag
customer_reviews.text: A good looking, practical bag for BYOB occasions. The partitions fold down flat against the side giving more flexibility if needed in how items are packed.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good to hold 3 insulated cups. Keeping bottle cork screw secured is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cassel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my sister for Christmas and she loved it. It's very elegant looking. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Neverland Bound

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. Looks nice and not cheesy. Planning to reorder for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 bottle carrier!
customer_reviews.text: We had 2 bottle and 6 bottle wine totes, but nothing in between. The 3 bottle tote will be used frequently.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself and daughter. Nice, great quality , for price.
customer_reviews.author: pap

customer_reviews.title: Great red wine bag!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to a friends NYE Parry filled with Champagne. Hostess loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Connor R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to tote wine bottles to gatherings. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Didn't look cheap. Added two bottles of wine and gave it as a Christmas present. Even came with a small corkscrew!
customer_reviews.author: shufflebud

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Kept one and gave several as gifts. Both attractive and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Smichels

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little more roomy for 2 bottles
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok just a little snug for 2 bottles depending on size and shape
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nicer wine bag than I realized!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a single complaint! In fact, the material is nicer than I realized. And it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ellis Bertoniere

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our friends
customer_reviews.text: Nice construction, looks good and carries 3 bottles of wine or two bottles plus two glasses.
customer_reviews.author: mag911

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality item works well with wine and champagne bottles; even those in a chilling sleeve. Highly recommend. The metal loops an the side make it suitable for attaching the case via D-ring to a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sherm

customer_reviews.title: Ciil
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Great quality, sturdy. Holds 2 really nice size wine bottles, bottles were giftwraped. Gave as a gift. The cork screw is a nice addition. Outside pocket holds napkins, etc. Really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give an honest review as it was given as a gift. Will say that it looked very nice — just as pictured online. Recipients plan to use for boating. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. The person seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Classy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits two bottles including German Reisling and high end 750ml fatter bottles but it’s snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mats

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: Size was a little smaller than originally anticipated, materials seemed slightly cheap but works and hasn't broken or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mdonny

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for “I can’t think of anything to give her” kinda friend!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Color is as depicted; appears sturdy, insulation adequate, nice cork screw surprise! Bought as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: CjC

customer_reviews.title: Will use this a lot
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need to carry our wine for our cruise. And it won’t take up too much room in our luggage empty.
customer_reviews.author: DZPONY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only beautiful bag, but kept the wine coolers cold for hours!! Recommended to others!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it is made from quality materials and offers lots ...
customer_reviews.text: This product just arrived so I haven't had a chance to utilize it's features. It seems like it is made from quality materials and offers lots of space. Looking forward to trying it. I will update after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: JPF540i

customer_reviews.title: Great function and look
customer_reviews.text: Came just as advertised, functions great. Was an awesome gift to give for a wine lover
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: he cork screw will snap leaving most of the screw in the cork.  Bring a spare.
customer_reviews.text: he cork screw will snap leaving most of the screw in the cork. Cheap Chinese garbage. Bring a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, cheap execution.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the bag itself is decent. I like how the inside is designed. It kept my drinks cool. But the zipper broke off on the first day of usage. Not what I expect from a newly delivered product, so now I just question the quality of the rest of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the bag yet so I can’t comment on how well wine will stay chilled. For some reason I thought the bag was hard shelled and it’s made from a softer material that allows it to be flatten. There is a wine bottle opener included.
customer_reviews.author: Kvlegal

customer_reviews.title: Terrific wine bottle carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome way to bring wine to a dinner party or weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pendergast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine carrier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carrier to take two bottles of wine to a party. Keeps white wine cool, and padding is perfect. Top being soft allows taller bottles to fit & movable flap between bottles allows for wider bottles. Price great & stylish!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a holiday gift. Very nice, good quality, comes with bottle opener. I want one for myself now

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and well made. Perfect for BYOB
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this and not one of the much more expensive ones. This is great. It is durable, stylish and an excellent value.

customer_reviews.title: No opener included
customer_reviews.text: The bottle opener was not in the package as advertised and the bag is a little different than the picture. Still a nice bag for the price.

customer_reviews.title: I've Got Wine
customer_reviews.text: The wine bag is very nice, the quality, price, size, color and accessory made it the ideal gift for my niece.

customer_reviews.title: Simply Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I am using it as a bottle bag instead of a wine bottle carrier. It is more durable than any bottle bag I purchased or was given.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and pretty for on the go
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter in law and she just loved it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was great. We bring wine everywhere and this is an easy an safe way to transport. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.text: This would have received my highest praise but for the corkscrew which broke off in the cork ended up ruining a nice bottle of wine.

product_meta.title: OPUX 2 Bottle Wine Tote Carrier | Insulated Wine Cooler Bag for Travel Picnic BYOB | Portable Wine Carrying Bag, Padded Protection, Shoulder Strap, Corkscrew Opener - Heather Grey
feature_bullets: PORTABLE WINE TRAVEL BAG Take your favorite wine bottles with you to a restaurant, outdoors, picnic, park, beach, dinner, or party. Comes with corkscrew bottle opener so you are always ready to enjoy your beverage! Also makes a great gift for wine lovers and hostess present.

WINE BOTTLE PROTECTION AND TEMPERATURE CONTROL Padded lining to protect the bottles from breaking during travel while its thermal insulated material keeps the temperature of your wine steady if it is chilled or at room temperature

CONVENIENT AND SMART DESIGN Features an adjustable and detachable shoulder strap along with padded hand straps for different carrying styles. Interior versatile flap ensures that your wine bottles will fit regardless of size and offers padded divider protection.

Beautiful And Durable Made from high-quality 600D polyester to ensure maximum durability and PU leather trim for a touch of elegance This bottle carrying bag is classic yet stylish. Makes a great birthday present or fathers day gift.
This Premium Insulated 2 Bottle Wine Tote Carrier by OPUX measures 8 x 3.5 x 12.6 (L x W x H). | Fits most standard 750ML wine bottles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars739 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
